H3.text: what music did louis armstrong play. Jazz

A4.text: He was an American jazz and blues trumpeter and vocalist.

A5.text: Armstrong codified the rhythmic technique of swing in jazz and broadened the jazz solo vocabulary.

A6.text: Armstrong's solos were a significant factor in making jazz a true 20th-century language.
